name: SOF - RAIDERS
description:
The year is 2048. North Africa and the Middle East have been devastated by fierce warfare. The civilian population have all been killed or fled the area. Countries have dissolved into battlegrounds. All that remain have turned into hardened soldiers and mercenaries. Presidents have been replaced with Warlords all fighting to take control of the region. The United States is bogged down in the great global depression and can only supply a few special forces in an attempt to help quell the rising threat. In this dire situation, you have been promoted from Green team to a tier 1 operator. You must execute well planned strike missions to contain the growing threat. There are no other options.
Features:
First person shooter action. Select from 6 weapons, frag grenades, flash grenade and health packs. Take a mission, load out your equipment and jump in the chopper.
Players skill with weapons, rank and battle ribbons will be updated depending on your actions and capabilities. The game will provide many random locations, events and enemy skills each time it is run. We wanted the game to be less predictable and repetitive so it will always provide a fresh challenge to game play.
Random events include:
Game areas randomly selected per campaign.
Objectives for each mission will be randomly generated.
Enemy soldiers will spawn randomly in different locations.
Full navigation meshes allow the enemy bots to hunt you through buildings.
